column1: tossed up on off, some turn, he leans forward to defend
lofted high over mid off and it just rolls into the rope! Tossed up, he got under it and lofted it high with control and with the spin
shorter length, he's back and pulling to short fine
quicker, drifting into off, he drives and gets a thick inside edge onto pad
late cut fine! Shorter and fractionally wide, it was quick too, he produced a nice late cut to get it fine of backward point
shorter into leg stump, he clips this straight to midwicket
nearly a return catch! Good length on off, he pushed with hard hands and chipped it just past the left hand of Bird as he dived in his follow through
advances and goes leg side to thump it over wide mid off! He predicted a good length, shimmied down early and clubbed it flat over the ring
angled down leg and it runs off the pad fine for four leg byes!
shorter into the hip, he tries to pull gets a bottom edge onto thigh guard and it drops down for a single
angled into leg stump, he clips this to midwicket for a couple

mis hit to mid on! Full on off, but not quite a half volley, he tried to loft over mid on but the seam movement meant it came off the inside half of the bat and floated to mid on where Christian took the catch well as it dipped on him late
drifting into leg, he tucks this to midwicket
full outside off, he drives to cover
full outside off, he mistimes a drive back to the bowler
thick edge flies through a vacant first slip! Full arm ball wide of off, he pinned the ears back on a drive and the thick edge runs away
slower on off, he tucks it behind square, Lynn wants one and is sent back but he gets home
advances and is nowhere near the length but lofts with control wide of long off

dropped by Christian running back at mid on! Lynn got under this and launched it miles in the air, Christian back pedalled rather than turning and running with it, the ball just kept floating over his head and he spilled it falling backwards
back of a length, he gets a leading edge to cover
good length, top of off, he gets a thick inside edge onto pad and it rolls into the off side

Another miscue to Christian and he takes this one! Denly charged at a back of a length delivery, the pitch is not that true, he tried to loft down the ground and was cramped, miscuing it to mid on and Christian moves to his left to take the catch
good length 134kph, nipping in, it hits him high on the pad
fuller outside off, he drives to mid off
full outside off, he drives to long off
full on middle, he pushes back to the bowler
shorter length, he's back and cutting to deep point
tossed higher and slower outside off, he slices a drive to backward point
flatter, good length, he's back and defending
fuller and drifting in, he stands up and drives through cover-point
good length, top of off, he defends to the gap at cover
drilled down the ground! Half volley and Burns crunched it back past the bowler
back of a length on leg, he tucks this to fine leg
short ball angled too far down leg, he ducks but it is wide
back of a length on the hip, he clips this behind square to fine leg
good length, top of off, he defends off a thick outside edge to backward point
good length, top of off, he defends on the front foot
back of a length on middle, he jumps back and defends this to mid on
back of a length, fifth stump line, he glides this to third man
shorter on leg stump, he pulls with ease behind square to the man in the deep
beaten trying to run this to third man but it was very tight to off
advances and is forced to defend after he drags his length back
caught behind! He was trying to run this to third man again and got a thin edge through to Philippe. Great bowling from Brathwaite to build pressure
back of a length on middle, he defends to midwicket and takes one
good length, he pushes from the crease to cover
back of a length wide of off, he square drives on the up to deep point
back of a length outside off, he defends to cover-point
132kph, back of a length outside off, he defends to cover-point and wants a single but Lynn wisely sends him back
back of a length on middle, he pulls fine to fine leg
drifting into leg, he drives firmly to long on
drifting into middle, he tries to drive to long on but mistimes it and can't beat O'Keefe
shorter outside off, he drives on the up to deep point
full on leg, he ships this to deep midwicket
fuller on off, he drives to long off
drifting into leg, he's back and working this to deep midwicket
132kph, good length, fourth stump, he pushes this to cover-point
nearly bowled! Slower ball back of a length, he tried to pull but it skidded lower and nearly trimmed the bails!
cut in the air just past backward point! Dangerous shot but it found the gap. Short and wide, the shot was on but he hit it flat at a catchable height behind point. But it was wide of the man
full on leg, he pushes slowly to long on, it only reaches the circle and they pinch two. Lynn had to test his hamstrings there
136kph, yorker on middle, he jams this out. Well bowled
good length angled into leg, it hits the pad and he's frustrated he missed out
leg break, on off, he's back and working this to midwicket
leg break on off, he's back and working this forward of square
shorter outside off, he pushes to point
faster leg break, it turns a touch, he gets a bottom edge into the pitch trying to cut
wrong un angled down leg, he glances this to wide fine leg
shorter length, he stands up and punches to long off
short ball hammered forward of square! Too short, it sat up and he smashed it into the gap
short slower ball, he pulls this past short fine! Slower balls are sitting up and Lynn taxes it
117kph, back of a length, this skids through and hurries Lynn and hits him on the glove
leg cutter outside off, he cuts firmly to backward point
slower ball cutter, he mistimes a drive to cover
slower ball outside off, he drives gently to cover
81kph, leg break drifting into off, he's back and working this to midwicket
drifting down leg, he tries to pull, it comes off pad and runs fine
wrong un angled down leg, he works this through midwicket
fuller leg break, he square drives on the up through point
shorter leg break, he's back but it's slower, he pulls to wide long on
full leg break, he square drives but doesn't time it to cover-point
Bird drops a sitter at mid off! Full outside off, he tries to loft down the ground and spooned it to mid off, Bird did have to run back but it wasn't a hard catch and he just parried it over his head
thick inside edge runs fine! Salt in the wound! Angled into the pads, he swings hard a thick inside edge runs away past short fine
angled into the pads, this runs off pad and rolls into the off side
slower ball sprayed way down the leg side
short slower ball, he pulls powerfully but straight to deep midwicket
yorker on the money, 134kph, at the base of off and he just digs it out
another french cut past leg stump! He charged at a length ball, it shaped in, he got a thick inside edge past leg stump! Lynn is having a golden run of luck tonight
heaved through square leg! A length slower ball on middle, he cleared the front leg and pulled it through square leg and dissected the two men in the deep

Bird takes a juggler at cover in between his legs! Peirson flushed this like a bullet to cover, it hit Bird in the chest, dropped down between his legs and he closed his legs in time for the ball to wedge in there before it hit the ground! Very fortunate to hang onto that. The third umpire takes a long look at it. But it looks like he's caught it clean. He closed his legs as he fell to his knees but the ball could not have hit the ground and come back up to wedge in there. He's out
advances and lofts over mid on! Classy shot first ball. He skipped down and got a half volley and lofted it over mid on with ease. It nearly went all the way
short slower ball, on leg, he pulls behind square to the man in the deep
tried for the yorker but Lynn muscles it back down the ground! 50 for Lynn off 42 balls. That is his slowest in the BBL. He used brute force to club this over the bowler's head
length ball launched miles in the air to deep square and it just clears the rope! Edwards was on the rope and dove over trying to catch and flick it back but it was just out of reach
shorter length, he pulls to deep midwicket

caught at deep midwicket by Silk! Superb catch. A short ball from Brathwaite, he smashed a pull shot long but flat to deep midwicket, Silk is right on the rope, he planted a foot just inside the rope, reached up, took the catch and the momentum meant he had to step over the rope, but he just flicked it up calmly, stepped out and then stepped back in to catch it with ease
full on leg, he whips this through midwicket
caught behind! A four day style dismissal! Back of a length, fifth stump line, he shuffled back and across and pushes at it, getting a thin edge through to the keeper
good length, fourth stump line, he defends to cover-point for a single
yorker length, he reaches out and gets it on the full, pushing to wide mid on
shorter leg break, he's back and cutting to deep point
drifting into middle, he's back and defending to forward square
tossed high and wide, he advances and has to reach to drive to deep cover
a step hit to the sightscreeen! Tossed up too full and he took one stride forward and swung through the line with power
wrong un, deceives him as he goes back to cut, gets a thick inside edge past leg stump
slid into middle and leg, he works this off the back foot through forward square
lofted into the upper deck at wide long on! Wow! What a strike. He charged to a slower ball and got it in the slot. He flushed it high over long on and up into the second tier
puled into the second tier at deep square! Ridiculous power! Another slower but it was short on leg, he swivelled and crunched it. It went down the tunnel onto the concourse!
low full toss outside off, he charges and drives to long off
clean bowled! Beaten by the slower ball. It was in the slot, a good length on off, he tried to heave over midwicket but was undone by the slower ball, it went through the gate and crashed into off
yorker on leg, he tucks this behind square to wide fine leg
slower ball bouncer, well directed, Gregory tries to pull but the lack of pace deceives him and beats him
back of a length fourth stump line, he tries to pull but misses
full on middle, he clips this off his toes through forward square
lofted high off the toe of the bat and falls well short of Silk running in at deep midwicket! Gregory broke his bat. That's why it didn't carry to the deep
given caught behind! Did this come off pad? A length ball angled into the pads, he tried to pull, it came off the pad clearly and went through the keeper. Clearly no bat involved. Not a good decision
yorker speared into middle, he gets a thick inside edge into pad and they pinch one
back of a length outside off, he cuts firmly to deep point

caught at deep point! Very full, angled across and very wide of off, he reaches out and slices this in the air all the way to deep point and Edwards runs in to take the catch. He did well to time it that far into the deep. A bit unlucky in the end
low full toss outside off, he square drive to deep point
full and too wide outside off. Ball is not happy with the call
leading edge is sliced high to cover-point but it lands safe. He was trying to whip to leg across the line
full at leg stump, he drives to long on. He missed out there mistiming it along the ground
lofted high down the ground towards the sight screen but it's not well timed, he gets two
bowled him! Middle stump is knocked back! He shaped to reverse sweep and got in a tangle, it went straight through his legs and smashed into middle
132kph, full toss on middle, he clips this through midwicket for a couple
beaten by late outswing! 138kph, angled in and shaping late past the edge as he drove very hard at it
back of a length, outswing, he cuts to backward point and Denly misfields.
beaten by a beauty! Back of a length, nipping away and he's squared up
back of a length on off, he defends on the back foot
advances and misses a ball that swings late away from the right hander
136kph, back of a length outside off, he's back and punching this to cover
back of a length again, he drives off the back foot to cover
shorter length, 132kph, he tries to pull from outside off but it shoots low

dropped by Bryant at deep square leg! A short ball, he pulled high over square leg, Bryant running from behind square ran along the rope, got there and spilled it! He was conscious of the rope and worried he had to flick it back. But he was fine. He just spilled it onto the rope but it just half volleyed into the padding

caught at midwicket! The drop only cost four runs! Another short ball, he tried to pull again but the two-paced nature of the surface caused a mis hit and he just shovelled it to midwicket. Easy catch for Gregory
good length wide of off, he reaches out to drive but mistimes it back to the bowler
leading edge trying to turn an outswinger to the on side, it runs safely wide of mid off
full outside off, he clips this elegantly wide of mid on for two
back of a length, wide of off, he pushes this to point off the back foot
he walks at a length ball, he tries to defends gets a inside edge and it nearly drops onto leg stump!
driven in the air just wide of cover! Brave shot in the air at a catchable height. But the timing was superb and he placed it in the gap
glided between slip and short third man! Superb skill. Good length outside off, he sat back and opened the face to thread it through the gap
back of a length outside off, he's back and punching to cover-point
back of a length, outside off, he's back and defending to backward point
back of a length outside off, he's back and running this to third man
good length, nipping in, it comes off the inside edge and runs to fine leg
thick edge but no slip! Good length, he's caught on the crease jabbing at it, gets a thick edge and it flies where slip was and away for four
good length, 132kph, off stump, he pushes back to the bowler
full on off, he drives to long on

caught at deep midwicket! Vince holes out and Bryant holds on! Shorter length, he went back to pull, it bounced a little lower than expected, he just checked his shot got a top edge that went all the way to the man at deep midwicket. Bryant pouched this
fired into leg, he's back and working this wide of long on into the gap and they get two
fired down leg, it comes off pad and rolls fine
off break outside off, he leans forward and works this to the circle at square midwicket and pinches two
good length outside off, he drives off a thick edge to backward point
half volley driven classically wide of mid off! Full outside off, and he leaned forward and caressed it into the gap
full on leg, he clips this to deep square leg
back of a length on leg, he clips this off the pads behind square

LBW! Looked plumb! Fuller length, pitching outside off and nipping back, he got his front pad across and played the wrong line, it hit above the knee roll and he is very tall but it wasn't a big stride. It looked very good and Edwards wasn't hanging around
beats the inside edge and goes over middle and off! Another one nips back and bounces over middle! Maybe Edwards' was too high!?
fuller outside off, he drives to deep cover-point
low full toss, he whips this through forward square to the man in the deep
Another elegant cover drive! A wide half volley and he leaned out and caressed this with superb timing
good length and quicker, he gets a thick inside edge trying to drive
good length, he slices this behind square and Lynn misfields
a little under edge not held by Peirson! It runs off the gloves past slip. Might have been a big deflection. Tough catch
good length darted into leg he defends
full outside off, he drives and slices a thick edge to wide third man
good length wide of off, he square drives on the up to deep point
good length, top of off, he pushes off the back foot off a thick inside edge to midwicket
lofted over mid off! He didn't time this well but got enough of it to get it over mid off. It was a good shot in the end
good length, fourth stump, he's back and chopping this to point
back of a length, wide of off, he punches off the back foot to deep cover-point
fuller on off, he is caught on the crease and defends
full on leg, he slog sweeps and gets a thick under edge to short fine
slower and flighted outside off, he mistimes to cover
Bowled him! The carrom ball! Silk didn't pick it. Pitching on off, he played for the normal ball coming in, it pitched and went the other way a touch past the edge and crashed into middle and off
off break outside off, he drives to cover
darted into off, he defends back to the bowler
fuller length outside off, he drives on the up to deep cover
back of a length on middle, he works this to midwicket
shorter on leg, he pulls to fine leg
full outside off, he slices this high in the air and it lands just short of third man running around!
yorker outside off, he jams this to cover
full on middle and he drags this over midwicket wide of long on and they get the two needed and claim the Bash Boost point
full on middle, he drives to long on
good length, top of middle, he defend from the crease
full on leg, he's working this through midwicket
full on middle and off, he defends on the front foot
full outside off, 91kph, he defends to cover
carrom ball wide of off, it beats the edge as he drives
back of a length on off, he's back and pushing to cover
shorter length, he's back and pulling to wide long on
back of a length wide of off, he's back and cutting to deep point
cracked over deep midwicket! A short ball that sat up and he thumped it flat over the long boundary!
back of a length, fourth stump, he defends from the crease
slower ball outside off, he chips a drive just short of mid off for a single
Christian walks at a length ball, he pushes this to point for a single
good length on middle, he works this to the circle at midwicket and calls two immediately and gets there easily
shorter length wide of off, he's back and cutting firmly to deep point
back of a length outside off, he late cuts to backward point
good length top of off, he defends on the front foot to cover-point
back of a length on off, he's back and working this to midwicket
back of a length into the hip, it comes off the thigh and runs behind square
pushed gently to the circle at mid on and they pinch two
shorter length, he's back and pulling powerfully through square leg, it's a touch greasy now and the sub Heazlett misfields on the rope to allow two
driven to long on
angled down leg and called wide
he advances and Bazley delivers a cracking bouncer that Christian ducks under late
slower ball on off, he pushes to long on
driven powerfully over the bowler's head! An attempted yorker but it was a half volley and he drilled a drive through the line
shorter on off, he thumps a pull shot straight to the man in the deep
top edge flies to third man! Back of a length, tight to off, he tried to pull but was cramped, got a top edge and it flew safely to fine third man for four
back of a length, off stump, he pulls but gets a thick inside edge onto pad
full toss lofted over mid on with ease! Attempted slower ball yorker after success with back of a length, it was a full toss and put away with ease
pulled over short fine! Another bad ball. Short down leg, he swivelled and pulled this easily over short fine
top edge for six over fine leg! Fine leg was up, it was a full speed bumper, he hooked, got a thick top edge and it carried into the crowd
length ball launched into the second tier at square leg! Wow. In the slot and he struck it with so much power. That sailed a good 20 metres, maybe further over the long boundary
slower ball bouncer outside off, he checks his cut shot chipping it short of deep point
fuller length on middle and on, he drives neatly straight to mid off on the circle
clubbed over long on! Flat like torpedo! Length ball on off, he swatted it with a horizontal bat and nearly took out Steve Gray, the Heat media manager outside the boundary!
shorter slower ball outside off, he swings and misses
good length, 136kph, top of off, he's back and working this to the circle at midwicket. Hughes posts another well made 50. He has done that easily
back of a length on off, he pushes back to the bowler with frustration
holes out to long on! A mistake! Hughes was in control, it was full on off and he just lazily lofted this, dragging it to long on and Steketee takes the catch!
back of a length on leg, he's back and knocking this to midwicket
shorter length, 133kph, into the ribs, he jumps back and defends
shorter cutter wide of off, he tries to cut, gets a bottom edge into the off side
good length, top of middle, he stands up and drives to long on
slower ball on off, he drives getting a thick inside edge through forward square

top edge caught at deep backward square! Heazlett held on ... just. A cracking bouncer from Steketee, Brathwaite took it on but wasn't in control, took his eyes off it as he pulled, got a top edge that flew to Heazlett in the deep, he let it get low but he held on just above the turf
131kph, into the hip, he's back and tucking this to short fine
short down the leg side, he tried to pull but it's called wide! Did it brush his shirt? Not sure. Maybe not
back of a length on middle, he produces a wild swing and misses
appeal for caught behind given not out. Another bouncer, he tried to pull but missed, Peirson and Steketee were certain he nicked it but the umpire was unmoved. It looked like he missed it
full toss outside off, he carves a drive along the ground straight to deep point! He nailed it but straight to the man
big swing and miss! 135kph, length ball outside off, he tried to heave over long on but missed

sky ball caught at mid off! A brilliant slower ball from Bazley. O'Keefe didn't spot the slower ball, mid off was up, he tried to over mid off but got under it, hit it straight up, Steketee backed back and took the catch really well
wide yorker, well executed, Christian reaches out and miscues back to the bowler
carved through cover! Superb shot. A wide yorker, and he just missed, Christian practices these religiously, opened up and smoked it through cover to beat deep point

wide yorker, well executed, he jammed it out back to Bazley, they ran, Bazley had options to run out either man and hesitated and then didn't throw! He picked it up in his left hand and didn't have time to get it into his right hand
length ball launched into the upper deck at deep midwicket! What a shot! What a player! In the slot, under pressure, he brings up a wonderful half-century! Christian is a marvel
slower ball, length outside off, he hammers it back at Bartlett who gets a hand on it, it runs to a big gap at mid off and Christian turns down the single!
wide yorker, Christian swings and misses! Perfectly executed wide yorker from Bartlett
sliced to deep point and Wildermuth drops it! It hung in the air for ever, Wildermuth runs a long way in, it curved to his left, he dived forward and spilled it! Tough chance. They get two

Is he run out or have they stole two? Safe by a frame! A great wide yorker, he jams it to mid off and they unbelievably try for two, the throw was awkward for Peirson, it bounced high, Peirson needed time to get it down to the stumps, Christian dives full length like Superman and got in by one inch!

full toss flicked past short fine! Christian pulls it off! He charged and Bartlett reacted firing a full toss at the hip, he flicked it powerfully at a catchable height but past short fine. Christian just wins. Every single time
